name: Great Hunt: North America
description: Enjoy challenging hunting missions in Ontario, Alaska or Colorado. Use your hunting dog wisely, improve your arsenal and collect valuable trophies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
